name: Frogonut
description: Ever wanted to be a frog with a thirst for chopping up coconuts? Me neither, but here's a game about it anyway. The aim is to hit the coconuts with the sword, any coconuts that go past you will make you lose a life, 3 strikes and you are out! top left is health and top right is the score. Make sure to stop the red coconuts first, they can do some damage!
